tool_description: The GraphQL API media encoder, converter, enhancer
name: EncMedIO
title: EncMedIO

api_list.name: Schema
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://encmedio.p.rapidapi.com/schema.graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encmedio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
